text: The Killer Meteors (Chinese: 風雨雙流星) (or The Killer Meteors, Jackie Chan vs. Wang Yu) is a 1976 Hong Kong Taiwanese action movie directed by Jimmy Wang Yu (who also stars) and Lo Wei. It stars Jackie Chan. ==Other websites== * Category:1976 action movies Category:Hong Kong action movies Category:Taiwanese movies Category:Golden Harvest movies Category:Movies directed by Lo Wei
title: The Killer Meteors
